channel.title: Eros Online - Runescape Project<3 :D Needs Developers!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i94.photobucket.com/albums/l109/sora4445/NewLogo.png[/img][/center] Eros Online
Me and iXm, the owners of Eros Online, are currently looking for a CLIENT coder, and a SERVER coder. We no longer need someone for our forums, due to the fact I finished up both sites, that run the forums, and the webpage. :) I soon hope to make them both one page, but who knows. Anywho. As said in the comments, I have stopped my Project on the 657 server, and am currently working on my new project. Which is bringing back the google. Yeah yeah. 'Some people have it' I don't care. The only thing different with mine, is that it'll be 24/7 and it wont go down. 'Unless I loose power' haha. Yes. There is alot of work to be done on it... Such as...
Green = Complete Yellow = Started Red = Not started
Combat:
Melee Mage Range
Skills: I don't think most of them work....
I'm currently using this: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,517239.0.html It's un-edited, well... It's edited partly, but is missing alot of it's interfaces....
The plans I have for this server are better than any other google/2007 remake anyone else has made.
Point being, i'm putting this team together so that WE can bring back what used to be the best thing in Runescape history. And when it's brought back, we'll hope to get our player base, and donations. When we get our donations, then we will be successful, and not have to worry about a thing. Just sit back, and enjoy the eco. And I want to be able to have everything full. I want the FULL tutorial island, I want just about everything full. If you can help. Just continue reading. :)
Also, I plan on adding the P2P feature as well, donate for it, and you get members access. Meaning you can do members quest, and non-members wont be able to do those quest at all. Also in that, I want to have ALL the quest finished, and I want to make it ALMOST 100% like RuneScape back in 2006/2007.
The only thing that really needs to be done with the client, is the loader. I want to work on that, so I can make it into a webclient. If you have ANY webclient experience, please get ahold of me. My contact information is in my signature. Also, I want to get the FULL runescape music with it. And it has to be all there. It can't be a few songs, and I want them to activate apon moving to a certain location.... If you feel you want to be apart of this development team, please drop an application in, and it'll be reveiwed, also feel free to add me on MSN or Skype, i'm on both of them, more than I used to be in the past. And I hope to be able to get this project going!
Name: Applying for: Age: Experience: Why you want that position in Eros Online: What can you do to help us achieve our goals: What are you capable of doing to make us more productive: MSN or Skype:[You can PM me your application for that too. Just so the community can't stalk you. xD]
[b]Client Developers: 0/2[/b] [b]Server Developers: 1/3[/b]
NOTE: If you do not give me your skype or MSN when you apply to be the Client, or server developer, And fail to ever send it to me, I will ignore your application.. And if you APPLY I don't want to see you one a week. You applied for a job as one of my Developers. You can be a developer from someone else, but if you apply for mine, please I don't want no. 'I'm busy' shit. Don't apply if you're going to give me that stuff. Alright? Alright. (: Happy applying. :D
[Will update when I think of more? O.o]
Also, in other news, I recently discovered a problem with the forums. I changed the forums link to another link, which is my current forums. Yes. it's SMF. No. It's not hosted by SMF. It's hosted by 000webhost.com, just like my main page.
In other news, I am still looking for forums developers[You get ingame mod], and if server coders get [ingame admin] We hope you join our development. :) Please and thank you.

item.dc:creator: @Demon6994 Demon6994
item.description:
@Demon6994 wrote:

Ok ill join as coder.

You didn’t put an application in, so no. If you would have posted an application, you would have been accepted. Sorry.

hmm…

Ok ill join as coder.

my app:

1 am g00d phr33 c0d3r <3

[size=3pt]trolling btw babes[/size]

Hello! As you should know, trolling is against our rules and therefore you have been punished! Please refrain from doing so in the future!
[/quote]Might as well punish everyone in this forum then.[/quote]

Exactly. Lmfao!

item.dc:creator: @Demon6994 Demon6994
item.description:
@Demon6994 wrote:

Ahhh, a client developer. Mmm, if you’re going to be a client developer, if I asked you to make a webclient out of a client I hand you, would you be able to perfer that task? And if so, would you be able to add anything that it needed if I asked you to add it?

I’ll accept this, go ahead and add me on skype, or even on MSN. (:

Read full topic

item.title: Eros Online - Runescape Project<3 :D Needs Developers!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

So where are you at with this? Im interested and read through all the posts but am unsure where you headed with this? Heres my application anyways

Name: Andy
Applying for: Client Developer
Age:21
Experience: 8 months with java, MySQL, and php. 2 years C++.
Why you want that position in Eros Online: To learn and have fun.
What can you do to help us achieve our goals: I can be active 30+ hours a week
What are you capable of doing to make us more productive: I think this is wrong. If someone isnt being productive let them go… But making people “more productive” sounds like being pushy and thats not what I have in mind of contributing to a team.
MSN or Skype:[You can PM me your application for that too. Just so the community can’t stalk you. xD] Sounds good to me

Read full topic
